Uses of Package
org.drasyl.serialization

Packages that use org.drasyl.serialization
Package
Description
org.drasyl
Core API that includes the DrasylNode and DrasylConfig.
org.drasyl.pipeline.serialization
Package contains classes that are used for serialisation of message to byte arrays and vice vera.
org.drasyl.serialization
Serialization of java objects to byte arrays and vice versa.
  • Classes in org.drasyl.serialization used by org.drasyl
    Class
    Description
    Serializer
    A Serializer represents a bimap between an object and an array of bytes representing that object.
  • Classes in org.drasyl.serialization used by org.drasyl.pipeline.serialization
    Class
    Description
    NullSerializer
    This Serializer (de)serializes null only.
    Serializer
    A Serializer represents a bimap between an object and an array of bytes representing that object.
